author: elecharny
msg: Fixed a big bug in the decoding of TLVs. When a constructed TLV with a zero length value
was encountered, the decoder was loosing its head...

author: elecharny
msg: * changed the BooleanDecoder class to use the newly created exception

author: elecharny
msg: * fixed a bug in ModifyDNRequestGrammr : an IntegerDecoder was used instead of a BooleanDecoder
* added the catch of BooleanDecoderException which has been added to the asn1-new-codec lib
